arts.ttl: Lille extends unbeaten run to 16 matches after late draw with Marseille in Ligue 1
arts.sum: Lille equalized against Marseille in the 87th minute in Ligue 1 on Saturday and extended its unbeaten run across all competitions to 16 matches. Second-placed Marseille was in the driving seat until Bafodé Diakité leveled for 1-1 at Stade Velodrome.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Marseille 1-1 Lille: Bafodé Diakité nets late equaliser to deny OM

arts.ttl: Premier League Interest grows for Jonathan David: Implications for Inter and Juventus
arts.sum: Jonathan David's future at Lille appears increasingly uncertain as the Canadian striker approaches the final months of his contract, which expires in June. The post Premier League Interest grows for Jonathan David: Implications for Inter and Juventus appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Lille predicted XI v Marseille: Edon Zhegrova returns
arts.sum: Edon Zhegrova was rested in midweek as Lille OSC overcame Sturm Graz in the UEFA Champions League, however, he will return to face Olympique de Marseille. The Kosovo international’s absence…
